316.sentence: i have shopped with amazon before and have been very happy with their performance thus far .

317.sentence: however , it has failed to deliver on quality .

318.sentence: it does not only have difficulty playing jpegs , it even has trouble properly playing dvd movies .

319.sentence: on several different occasions it has displayed " no disc " with a disc inside .

320.sentence: i read in consumer reports that apex is a reliable brand , but with my experience and reading the other reviews , i think i will be doing a little more homework before considering another apex product .

321.sentence: the 2600 had false silver plate instead of play display .

322.sentence: it plays original dvds and cds and plays mp3s and jpegs .

323.sentence: however , it does not play windows media and i can not get it to play any of my divx rips .

324.sentence: also , it was only $ 39.99 ( after rebate ) with free shipping and no tax so overall it is a decent player .

326.sentence: can 't say whether i rec 'd an " updated " model but it will not read dvd + rw 's or vcd 's for me .

327.sentence: it did play a dvd-r which was unplayable in my older philips machine .

328.sentence: mixed bag i guess but the price was right .

329.sentence: this is the third apex product i 've bought and they continue to impress for the price .

330.sentence: the build quality feels solid , it does n't shake or whine while playing discs , and the picture and sound is top notch ( both dts and dd5.1 sound good ) .

331.sentence: it looks really sleek and stylish , and does everything it claims .

332.sentence: i tried as bunch of different formats to see if it would play and it did .

333.sentence: i am very pleased with this product and the price to match and have n't had any problems .

334.sentence: there are really easy directions for setup and fiddling around with the picture , zoom etc .

335.sentence: so sit back , relax and brag to all your friends who paid a mountain of money for a dvd player that can 't do half the things this one can , and for a fraction of the price !

338.sentence: silverish color really adds a special touch .

339.sentence: it plays just about any format ( check before you buy if it plays yours . )

340.sentence: either way , can 't go wrong with this price .

341.sentence: i am really impressed by this dvd player .

342.sentence: for instance , i made several back-ups of my dvd movies using dvd-r ( w ) and + r ( w ) and it plays the dvds .
